Which of the following statements are correct regarding administrative system under Arabs?
1. Muhammad-bin-QasimÂ divided Sind and Multan into a number of Iqtas or districts.
2. Iqtas were headed by Arab military officers.
3. The sub-divisions of the districts were administered by the local Hindu Officers.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Muhammad-bin-Qasim divided Sind and Multan into a number of Iqtas or districts. These Iqtas were headed by Arab military officers. Whereas the sub-divisions of the districts were administered by the local Hindu Officers.
